name: Tap as Fast as You Can !
name_original: Tap as Fast as You Can !
description:
Up for a challenge? Try this simple app!
* Train your speed and accuracy in 10 seconds per game!
* Games are always unique. Endless possibilities!
* Earn all achievements, Compete with the world! (Game Center)

How to play:
- Tap the bright square as fast as you can before the timer runs out.
- Touching unlit squares will end the game.

Good luck and have fun !
